Schools to Prepare Colporteur Evangelists.--Our schools have been established by the Lord; and if they are conducted in harmony with His purpose, the youth sent to them will quickly be prepared to engage in 
                                                                           31
various branches of missionary work. Some will be trained to enter the field as missionary nurses, some as canvassers, some as evangelists, some as teachers, and some as gospel ministers.--Review and Herald, Oct. 15, 1903.
